root.name: Drascula: The Vampire Strikes Back
root.description: OverviewThis 2D point and click adventure game is a parody of the Dracula legend featuring cartoonish graphics. StoryJohn Hacker, estate agent, is sent to Transylvania to finish off a sale with Count Drascula. After arriving in town, he falls in love with Billie Jean, an attractive woman who promptly gets kidnapped by a vampire. Determined to save her, he sets out on a quest to find the vampire and destroy it. Freeware ReleaseThe game is legitimately free from the ScummVM project.
